buginformation.summary: smart name removal causing compiler crash
buginformation.description: what steps will reproduce the problem compiler the following code advanced mode var goog goog inherits function var constructor page selection model function constructor page selection model foo event function constructor page selection model select event function goog inherits page selection model change event page selection model foo event what the expected output what you see instead the compiler will crash the last var check throws illegal state exception because knows something wrong the crash caused smart name removal has special logic for counting references class defining function calls like goog inherits and isn properly creating reference page selection model can longer reproduce this with the latest build nick you still see problem can still repro this issue was closed revision 1759
